verses.text: A Song of degrees. They that trust in the LORD, shall beas mount Zion, whichcannot be removed, butabideth for ever.
Asthe mountains areround Jerusalem, so the LORD isaround his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands to iniquity.
Do good, O LORD, to those thatare good, and to them that areupright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside to their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: butpeace shall beupon Israel.
